summary: Adds new followers to some of Skyrims different factions. (Includes Dark Brotherhood, Thieves guild, College of Winterhold, the Imperials and a small bonus in Dragonsreach). Also all of them should be up for marriage!
descriptionHtml:
Adds new followers to some of Skyrims different factions. (Includes Dark Brotherhood, Thieves guild, College of Winterhold, the Imperials and a small bonus in Dragonsreach)


[color=red][size=6]Who are added?[/size][/color]


Sara - A Breton mage in Hall of the Elements )[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/11534682/?]Psychobreach[/url] came up with the name)
Ronald Dillinger - An Alik'r warrior in Dragonsreach (Credits to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/11534682/?]Psychobreach[/url] blame him for the idea)
Dana - A Dark elf rogue in Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary (or in Dawnstar Sanctuary depending on the version you download)
Chance - A Nord rogue in the Ratway (also was supposed to be the only follower that this mod offers, that is the reason for .esp's name)
Cam - An Imperial warrior in castle dour (Because of her you probably came here in the first place)
[u][b]And more to come![/b][/u] Maybe? IF I have time. [s][b]Look forward to next weekend![/b][/s]


[color=cyan][size=6]Requirements[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyhair[/url]
You will also need the females add-on for Skyhair.
An up-to-date version of Skyrim

[color=yellow][size=6]Credits[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]Apachii for Skyhair[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/11534682/?]Psychobreach[/url] for testing, screenshots and the idea of Ronald Dillinger

[color=red][size=6]Permissions[/size][/color]

Ask me (like you would want to use this..)

[color=cyan][size=3]Don't forget to leave feedback and post your pictures, as I [b]NEED[/b] pictures[/size][/color]

Changes:
0.5 Initial release
0.6 Fixed Cam not willing to follow
author: XBitu Psychobreach
